channel.title: Qrcode on Seven Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Qrcode on Seven Theme

item.title: Add additional social links
item.description: The theme defaults to providing social links for email, Github, X, and WeChat, but these may not be sufficient. However, you can add additional social links by overriding the hook_social_links.html file. hook_social_links.html is a hook that you can create a file with the same name in the partials/index directory of your site to override the default implementation. YourSite/layouts/partials/index/hook_social_links.html Regular LinksRegular links, where clicking the icon directly redirects to the link address.
